subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Tim Duncan, Manu Ginobili and Tony Parker are trying to let the team be carried by Leonard, 23, who has averaged 19.6 points and 6.5 rebounds a game since March.
snippet: Tim Duncan, Manu Ginobili and Tony Parker are trying to let the team be carried by Leonard, 23, who has averaged 19.6 points and 6.5 rebounds a game since March.
